text: Ramadan yavlyaye soboyu misyatsʹ pid chas kotroho Quran bulo vidkryte, zabezpechuyuche kerivnytstvo dlya lyudey, yasnykh vykladannya, ta statutu knyha. Tsey vas kotrykh zasvidchuyete tsey misyatsʹ budete shvydko tam. Tsey khto ye khvoryy abo mandruyuchyy mozhe zaminyty te zhe chyslo inshykh dniv. BOH bazhaye dlya vas zruchnistʹ, ne neharazdy, shcho vy mozhete fulfill vashi zobov'yazannya, ta glorify BOH dlya toho, shchob keruvaty vamy, ta shchob vyrazyty vashu otsinku
